group.name: Do you use Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch

plugin.name: Yes
plugin.description: These patches are meant to be used with the STEP build Dread's Skyrim Build. IMPORTANT! The Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch is required to use these patches.

plugin.name: No (quit)
plugin.description: These patches are meant to be used with the STEP build Dread's modlist. IMPORTANT! The Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch is required to use these patches.

plugin.name: Rustic Soul Gems (sorted ESL GIST version)

plugin.name: Cloaks of Skyrim and Winter is Coming
plugin.description: Install patches for both Cloaks of Skyrim and Winter is Coming. Make sure that you use both mods.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim Cutting Room Floor Patch
Stendarr Rising - The Hall of the Vigilant Rebuild
Luminosity Lighting Overhaul - The Cathedral Concept
OBIS SE - Organized Bandits In Skyrim
Tweaks to core game
plugin.description: Tweaks: - Timescale reduced from 20 to 15 - Chance of recovering arrors incresed from 33% to 50% - Greeting distance is reduced - Increased arrow speed - Fast travel speed fix. The correct ammount of time will pass as you fast travel. - Battle cry fix by NTense (Skipped if Aetherius is installed) (open permissions) https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12133 - Don't talk with your mouth full (open permissions) https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17715 - NPC's moves further away and reacts faster when they are in the way - No spinning death animation

plugin.name: Slower skill gain
plugin.description: Tweaks: - Skills capped at 100, like in the vanilla game - Skills level at 50% - 5 carry weight gained if stamina is increased when leveling up, like in the vanilla game - Legendary skills are turned off

plugin.name: Slower skill gain without grinding
plugin.description: This is a custom Skyrim Uncapper settings and my personal preference. It is recommended to tweak the Uncapper settings yourselves. Tweaks: - Skills capped at 100 - Skills level at 50% speed except smithing, alchemy and pickpocket which level at 200% speed - 5 carry weight gained if stamina is increased when leveling up, like in vanilla - Legendary skills are turned off

file.source: Uncapper ini alternatives\50% leveling + no grinding\SkyrimUncapper.ini

plugin.name: Radiant Requirements settings
plugin.description: Radiant Requirement default settings tweaked to match encounter zones from Arena.

plugin.name: Timing is Everything settings
plugin.description: Recommended Timing is Everything profile.

plugin.name: Creation Club Survival Mode - No carry weight penalty
plugin.description: This tweak removes the carry weight penalty from the Creation Club Survival Mode.

plugin.name: Experience settings
plugin.description: This is a settings file for the mod Experience. It enables experience gain from miscellaneous quests and from killing enemies. This also installs a patch for Experience to allow experience gain from killing enemies added by other mods included in this modlist.

plugin.name: Higher Bounty Rewards
plugin.description:
Alex's Higher Bounty Rewards lite is a mod that increases the rewrds for certain quests:
- Bandit Camp: 1000 gold - Forsworn Camp: 1500 gold - Giants: 2500 gold - Dragons: 7500 gold
Since the mod only alters values in four records in Skyrim.esm, it is impossible to patch without making the mod redundant. These patched plugins therefore replaces the original mod.
Please download and endorse the original mod, but do not install it: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11294

plugin.name: No leveled unique items
plugin.description: No more low level unique items. Unique items in Skyrim actually exists as different versions with different levels. If you discover an item when your character is at a lower level, you will get a lower level version of that item. This setting removes that feature. From now on you will get the most powerfull version of all unique items you find.

plugin.name: Slower leveling for Experience
plugin.description: This edits fXPLevelUpBase and fXPLevelUpMult to slow down character level gain to 50%. It is recommended to slow down skill gain using one of the uncapper settings provided above or creating a settings file yourself.

plugin.name: TDN Equipable Horns SE Tweaks
plugin.description: This makes all equipable horns from the mod free to craft.

plugin.name: Black Sacrament Tweaks
plugin.description: Tweaks for consistency: - All armor pieces has reduced armor rating to match Nightingale armor. - All weapons has reduced stats to match Ebony weapons - The tanto matches the stats for a dagger but has slightly less reach, does less damage but is lighter and much faster. - The nijato is a one handed sword that is a little faster and lighter and does slightly less damage. - The nodachi is a two handed sword with slightly less reach. It does less damage but is lighter and much faster. - All weapons crafting and tempering recipes are modified to include ebony. - Compatibility with Ars Metallica, if that mod is used.

plugin.name: Lustmord Tweaks
plugin.description: Tweaks for consistency: - Bolt damage lowered and bolt price raised to match stats from Faction Crossbows. - Explosive bolts recipe altered to match the one from Faction Crossbows

plugin.name: More Crafting Equipment - Cloaks consistency tweaks
plugin.description: Tweaks: - The spinning wheel from Cloaks of Skyrim can no longer be used to craft linen cloaks. It can only be used to craft threads. - All cloaks from Cloaks of Skyrim is crafted using the loom from More Craftable Equipment. - The recipes for Cloaks from Cloaks of Skyrim now uses thread instead of leather of linen wraps.

plugin.name: Scout Armor Tweaks
plugin.description:
Tweaks for consistency:
- Scout Arrows stats are changed to match nordic Arrows. - Weapons stats are modified to match nordic steel. - All weapons crafting and tempering recipes are modified to match thoose of nordic steel. - Capes moved from slot 35 to slot 40 and 46. Capes now uses the same slots as Cloaks of Skyrim and Winter is Coming does. - Capes are no longer considered to be made of dragonscale. - Armor is given keywords to work consistent with the survival mode. - Changes from Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch are applied. - Compatibility with Ars Metallica, if that mod is used.

plugin.name: Talos Housecarl Armor Pack
plugin.description:
Tweaks for consistency:
- All capes are considered to be clothing instead of armor and armor rating is set to 0. - Both weapons are considered to be be nordic instead of steel and has their stats and recipes altered to reflect this. - The one handed hammer has its stats changed to match the maul from Heavy Armory.

plugin.name: Scout Armor BodySlides
plugin.description: This installs BodySlides to build CBBE compatible meshes for Scout Armor. Since Scout Armor uses Blades Armor meshes I could build these BodySlides by simply modifying the CBBE Blades Armor BodySlides.
